about_the_game:
In the game Egypt Frontiers players have the opportunity to explore the fascinating world of ancient Egypt, where they can construct pyramid using a variety of authentic building techniques and architectural solutions known to the ancient Egyptians. The game faithfully reproduces both the tools and construction techniques, allowing for a realistic experience of the pyramid-building process.

As rulers of ancient Egypt, players will manage their people, providing resources, solving social problems, and making strategic decisions that will shape the development of their civilization. The choice between learning about the true history of Egypt or creating their own alternative vision gives players the freedom to shape their civilization.

The game spans from the time of the first pyramids to the era of great scientific discoveries, allowing players to delve into various stages of Egypt's development. The strategy mode enables players to make global decisions, while the first-person mode provides a more personal and interactive experience of life in ancient Egypt.
